fields.name: THE GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TB & MALARIA

fields.help_text: An IHP+ Compact or equivalent mutual agreement is in place
fields.name: IHP+ Compact

fields.help_text:
100% of IHP+ countries
where the signatory operates
have support for/commitment
to the IHP+ compact (or
equivalent) mutually agreed
and documented.
fields.name: Proportion of IHP+

fields.help_text: A National Health Sector Plan/Strategy is in place with current targets & budgets that have been jointly assessed.
fields.name: National Health Sector

fields.help_text: Halve the proportion of aid flows to the health sector are not reported on government's budget(s) (with at least 85% reported on budget)
fields.name: Percent of aid

fields.help_text: A costed, comprehensive national HRH plan (integrated with the health plan) is being implemented or developed
fields.name: Costed, evidence-based HRH

fields.help_text: 50% or more of technical cooperation flows to each IHP+ country in which the signatory operates are implemented through  coordinated programmes that are consistent with national plans/strategies for the health sector
fields.name: Percent of current

fields.help_text: 66% of aid flows are provided in the context of programme based approaches
15% (or an equivalent published target) of the national budget is allocated to health
fields.name: Proportion of public

fields.help_text: 90% (or an equivalent published target) of health sector funding provided through multi-year commitments [min. 3 years]
Halve the proportion of health sector funding not disbursed against the approved annual budget
fields.name: Proportion of health

fields.help_text: Improvement of at least one measure (ie 0.5 points) on the PFM/CPIA scale of performance.
fields.name: Country procurement

fields.help_text: Halve the proportion of health sector aid not disbursed within the year for which it was scheduled
fields.name: Percent of health

fields.help_text: Improvement of at least one measure on the four-point scale used to assess performance for this sector
One-third reduction in the % of health sector aid to the public sector not using partner countries' procurement systems
fields.name: Percent of health

fields.help_text: A transparent and monitorable performance assessment framework is in place to assess progress against (a) the national development strategies relevant to health and (b) health sector programmes
fields.name: An agreed, transparent

fields.help_text: One-third reduction in the % of health sector aid to the public sector not using partner countries' PFM systems
fields.name: Percent of aid

fields.help_text: Mutual assessments (such as a joint Annual Health Sector Review) are being made of progress implementing commitments in the health sector, including on aid effectiveness.
fields.name: Mutual Assessments, such

fields.help_text: Reduce by two-thirds the stock of parallel project implementation units (PIUs)
fields.name: Parallel Project Implementation

fields.help_text: At least 10% of seats in the country's Health Sector Coordination mechanisms are allocated to Civil Society representatives.
fields.name: Evidence that Civil

fields.help_text: Single national performance assessment frameworks are used, where they exist, as the primary basis to assess progress in all IHP+ countries where the signatory operates
fields.name: Proportion of IHP+

fields.help_text: Annual mutual assessment of progress in implementing health sector commitments & agreements (such as the IHP+ country compact and on aid effectiveness in the health sector), is being made in all the countries where the signatory operates

fields.question: Is there an IHP+ Country Compact (or equivalent agreement) in place?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: <If yes, please provide details of the Compact or equivalent, including its title and the period which it covers.                                                                 <If not, please explain why, including your efforts in leading on the creation of such an agreement in the future.

fields.question: Have you signed the IHP+ Country Compact (or equivalent agreement)?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: < If not, please explain why.

fields.question: Does the National Health Sector Strategy (or equivalent) include current targets and budgets?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: <If yes, please provide details of the plan, including its title and the period which it covers.                                          <If not, please describe your efforts to ensure that such targets and budgets are included in the future.

fields.question: Has the National Health Sector Strategy been jointly assessed?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: <If yes, please describe any plans in place to get the plan jointly assessed, include details about timeframes.                                             <If not, please provide an explanation of the circumstances.

fields.question: How much health sector aid for the government sector ($USD) did you disburse in calendar years 2007 and 2009?
How much of this ($USD) was reported on national health sector budgets in 2007 and 2009?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: < Please provide details of the specific actions/support that you are providing in this area.                                                              < If you have not met the agreed target (see target column), please provide an explanation of the circumstances.

fields.question: Is there a costed, comprehensive, evidence based HRH plan (that is integrated with the national health plan) that is being implemented or developed?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: <If yes, please provide details of the plan, including its title and the period which it covers, and details on how its been implemented.                             <If not, please provide an explanation of the circumstances

fields.question: How much technical cooperation for health did you disburse ($USD) in calendar year 2007 and 2009?
How much technical cooperation for health did you disburse through coordinated programmes that are consistent with national plans/strategies for the health sector?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: < Please provide details of the specific actions/support that you are providing in this area.                                                              < If you have not met the agreed target (see target column), please provide an explanation of the circumstances.

fields.question: How much health sector aid ($USD) did you disburse at country level in calendar years 2007 and 2009?
How much health sector aid did you disburse in support of initiatives adopting programme-based aproaches in calendar years 2007 and 2009?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: < Please provide details of the specific actions/support that you are providing in this area.                                                              < If you have not met the agreed target (see target column), please provide an explanation of the circumstances.

fields.question: What was the total amount of public funding/national budget in $USD?
What was the total amount of public funding allocated to health in $USD?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: <Please provide details of the specific actions/support that you are providing in this area;                                                              < If you have not met the agreed target (see target column), please provide an explanation of the circumstances.

fields.question: How much health sector aid ($USD) did you disburse at country level in calendar years 2007 and 2009?
How much of this was provided through multi-year commitments (at least 3 years)?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: < Has your agency published a target (that differs from 90%) for the percent of health sector aid provided through multi-year commitments?  If so, please confirm that target and show where it was published.                                                                  < Please provide details of the specific actions/support that you are providing in this area.                                                              < If you have not met the agreed target (see target column), please provide an explanation of the circumstances.

fields.question: What was the total amount ($USD) of the approved annual budget for the health sector?
What was the total amount ($USD) of funding disbursed against the approved annual budget for the health sector?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: <Please provide details of the specific actions/support that you are providing in this area;                                                              < If you have not met the agreed target (see target column), please provide an explanation of the circumstances.

fields.question: Please provide scores against the PFM/CPIA scale of performance.
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: NB:  The "Guide to Key Terms & Definitions" provides data for PFM/CPIA scores.  IHP+Results will use this data.  Please include any comments on those scores, with answers to the following questsions, in the column "Answers & additional information":                  <If PFM/CPIA score is below 3.5, are there reform programmes in place to strengthen thes?                                                                       <Please provide details of the specific actions/support that you are providing in this area.                                                              < If you have not met the agreed target (see target column), please provide an explanation of the circumstances.

fields.question: In calendar years 2007 and 2009, how much health sector aid did you disburse at the country level?
How much health sector aid did you disburse within the year for which it was scheduled?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: < Please provide details of the specific actions/support that you are providing in this area.                                                              < If you have not met the agreed target (see target column), please provide an explanation of the circumstances.

fields.question: Please provide the scores for the four point scale used to assess performance in the procurement sector for 2007 and 2009.
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: NB:  The "Guide to Key Terms & Definitions" provides available data for "four point scale".  IHP+Results will use this data.  Please include any comments on this data, with answers to the following questsions, in the column "Answers & additional information":<If this data is not available, please provide details on how procurement systems adhere to broadly accepted good practices.                                                           <If procurement systems do not adhere to broadly accepted good practices, are there reform programmes in place to strengthen these?                                                                <Please provide details of the specific actions/support that you are providing in this area;                                                              < If you have not met the agreed target (see target column), please provide an explanation of the circumstances.

fields.question: How much health sector aid for procurement was disbursed in 2007 and 2009?
In calendar years 2007 and 2009, how much of this used national procurement systems ?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: <Please provide details of the specific actions/support that you are providing in this area.                                                              <If you have not met the agreed target (see target column), please provide an explanation of the circumstances.                                    <If you are not using national procurement systems, please explain why and what you are doing to strengthen them?

fields.question: Is there a transparent and monitorable performance assessment framework which is in place to assess progress in the health sector
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: <Please provide details of the specific actions/support that you are providing in this area.                                                            < If you have not met the agreed target (see target column), please provide an explanation about the circumstances.

fields.question: How much health sector aid for the government sector  was disbursed in 2007 and 2009?
How much of this used national public financial management systems in 2007 and 2009?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: < Please provide details of the specific actions/support that you are providing in this area.                                                              < If you have not met the agreed target (see target column), please provide an explanation of the circumstances.                                   >If you are not using national PFM systems (budget execution, financial reporting procedures, national auditing procedures), please explain why and what you are doing to help strengthen them?

fields.question: Did you undertake a mutual assessment[s] of progress in implementing health sector commitments including on aid effectiveness?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: <If such a mechanism is not in place please provide details on your efforts to ensure such mechanisms are being introduced in the future, including how it will monitor aid effectiveness.                                                                     <Please provide details of the specific actions/support that you are providing in this area.                                                              < If you have not met the agreed target (see target column), please provide an explanation of the circumstances.

fields.question: How many parallel project implementation units did you make use of in the provision of health sector aid for the government sector 2007 and 2009?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: < If you have not met the agreed target (see target column), please provide an explanation of the circumstances.                                                   < If you are using PIUs please comment on the trend in use, and plans to reduce the stock of PIUs.

fields.question: How many seats were allocated to civil society representatives on the health sector coordination mechanism?
What is the total number of seats on the health sector coordination mechanism?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: <Please provide any additional details relating to this.                                                                        <If you wish, please provide details of the specific actions/support that you are providing in this area.                                                              < If you have not met the agreed target (see target column), please provide an explanation of the circumstances.

fields.question: Did you routinely use a single national performance assessment framework as the primary basis to assess progress in your country?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: < If you do not use a single national performance assessment framework please provide details on why, including details on your efforts to use such a framework in the future.

fields.question: What were the total number of Development Partner / Donor missions in 2007 and 2009?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: <Please comment on the extent to which these have been conducted jointly by Development Partners.

fields.question: Did you undertake a mutual assessment(s) of progress in implementing health sector commitments, including on aid effectiveness?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: < If such a mechanism is not in place please provide details on your efforts to ensure such a mechanism is in place in the future, including how it will monitor aid effectiveness.          <If you have undertaken a mutual assessment, please provide details on how you participated in this mechanism.

fields.question: Please comment on the effectiveness of the JAR as an accountability mechanism.
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: < Please provide an assessment of the strengths and weaknesses of the JAR to to monitor health sector aid effectiveness commitments.                                                              < What needs to be done to strengthen the JAR as an accountability mechanism?

fields.question: How many development partners used a pooled funding mechanism (if it exists)?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: <Please name the development partner(s) who used a pooled funding mechanism.

fields.question: What support, if any, did you provide to civil society organisations to enable them to participate in health sector policy processes - including health sector planning, coordination and review mechanisms?
How much health sector aid ($USD) did you disburse through other donors (ie. health sector aid that is not captured in your response to Q2 above) at country level in 2007 and 2009?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: <If you provided this kind of support, please provide further details, including amounts and donors that you disbursed to.

fields.question: How many skilled medical personnel were there in 2007 and 2009?
What was the total population in 2007 and 2009?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: <Is the availability of skilled medical personnel sufficient?                                   <Does it meet national targets, if these exist?                                       <What are the obstacles to improving the availability of skiller health workers?

fields.question: How much general budget support ($USD) did you disburse in 2007 and 2009?
How much sector budget support did you disburse in 2007 and 2009?
How many total outpatient department visits were there in 2007 and 2009?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: <How does this relate to national targets, if these exist?

fields.question: What was the total amount ($USD) spent on the health workforce in 2007 and 2009?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: <How does this relate to national targets (if these exist), or projected need?

fields.question: Does the HMIS provides timely, relevant and robust data on results (see supplementary questions)?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: <What year is the latest available  data from?                                           <By what date (year and month) was the data available?                                            <What % of hospitals and health centres provided data?

fields.question: How many Indicators are there in the National Results Framework?
How many Indicators were actually tracked (eg to respond to requests from DPs for additional reporting)?
Supplemental information
fields.help_text: <Did development partners request that additional indicators were tracked (in addition to those included in the national results framework)?                                              <If so, which development partners and how many indicators?

fields.question: When was the date of the last Joint Annual Health Sector Review (JAR)?
Please comment on the level of representation at the JAR?
Please comment on the effectiveness of the JAR as an accountability mechanism
